trans-unit.source: %1%Authorized form of name%2% - This is a %3%mandatory%4% element.
trans-unit.target: %1%forma autorizada do nome%2% - Este éche un elemento %3%obrigatorio%4%.
%1%Identificador de descrición%2% - Este éche un elemento %3%obrigatorio%4%.

trans-unit.source: "Record the authorised form of name and any unique identifier of the related function." (ISDF 5.3.1)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistre a forma autorizada do nome e calquer identificador único da función relacionada." (ISDF 5.3.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record a general category into which the relationship being described falls." (ISDF 5.3.2) Select a category from the drop-down menu: hierarchical, temporal or associative.

"Record a precise description of the nature of the relationship between the function being described and the related function." (ISDF 5.3.3) Note that the text entered in this field will also appear in the related function.
trans-unit.target: "Rexistre unha descrición precisa da natureza da relación entre a función que se describe e a función relacionada." (ISDF 5.3.3) Notar que o texto ingresado neste campo tamén aparecerá na función relacionada.

trans-unit.source: Dates of creation, revision or deletion
trans-unit.target: Datas de creación, revisión ou eliminación

trans-unit.source: "Specify whether the description is a function or one of its subdivisions." (ISDF 5.1.1) Select the type from the drop-down menu; these values are drawn from the ISDF Function Types taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: "Especifique se a descrición é unha función ou unha da súas subdivisións." (ISDF 5.1.1) Seleccione o tipo dende o menú despregable; eses valores son extraídos des da taxonomía ISDF de Tipos de Función.

trans-unit.source: "Record the authorised name of the function being described. In cases where the name is not enough, add qualifiers to make it unique such as the territorial or administrative scope, or the name of the institution which performs it. This element is to be used in conjunction with the Function description identifier element (5.4.1)." (ISDF 5.1.2)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar a forma autorizada do nome da función que se describe. En casos onde o nome no abonde, engadir calificadores para facelo único, tal como o alcance territorial ou administrativo, ou o nome da institución que a desenvolve. Este elemento é para ser usado en conxunto coo elemento identificador de descrición de Función (5.4.1)." (ISDF 5.1.2)

trans-unit.source: "Purpose: To indicate the various forms in which the authorized form(s) of name occurs in other languages or script forms. Rule: Record the parallel form(s) of name in accordance with any relevant national or international conventions or rules applied by the agency that created the description, including any necessary sub elements and/or qualifiers required by those conventions or rules. Specify in the Rules and/or conventions element (5.4.3.) which rules have been applied." (ISDF 5.1.3)
trans-unit.target: "Propósito: Indicar as varias formas nas cales a forma autorizada do nome aparece noutros idiomas ou forma(s) de escritura. Regra: Rexistre a forma(s) paralela do nome dacordo a calquer convención ou regra nacional ou internacionais empregadas polá xencia que creou a descrición, incluíndo calquer sub elemento necesario e/ou calificadores obrigatorios por aquelas convencións ou regras. Nos elementos utilizados de regras e/ou convencións (5.4.3) especifique que regras se aplicaron" (ISDF 5.1.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record any other names for the function being described." (ISDF 5.1.4)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistre calquer outro nome pará función que se describe." (ISDF 5.1.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record any term and/or code from a classification scheme of functions. Record the classification scheme used in the element Rules and/or conventions used (5.4.3)." (ISDF 5.1.5)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar calquer termo e/ou código dende un esquema de clasificación de funcións. Rexistrar o esquema de clasificación usado no elemento de regras e/ou convencións utilizados (5.4.3)." (ISDF 5.1.5)

trans-unit.source: "Provide a date or date span which covers the dates when the function was started and when it finished. If a function is ongoing, no end date is needed." (ISDF 5.2.1)
trans-unit.target: "Proporcione unha data ou período que abrangue as datas en que a función foi iniciada e cando rematou. Si a función continua, non se precisa data de finalización." (ISDF 5.2.1)

trans-unit.source: "Record a narrative description of the purpose of the function." (ISDF 5.2.2)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistre unha descrición narrativa do propósito da función." (ISDF 5.2.2)

trans-unit.source: "Record in narrative form or as a chronology the main events relating to the function." (ISDF 5.2.3)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar os eventos principais relativos á función en forma narrativa ou como unha cronoloxía." (ISDF 5.2.3)

trans-unit.source: "Record any law, directive or charter which creates, changes or ends the function." (ISDF 5.2.4)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar calquera lei, directriz ou carta que crea, cambia ou finalizá función." (ISDF 5.2.4)

trans-unit.source: "Record a unique description identifier in accordance with local and/or national conventions. If the description is to be used internationally, record the code of the country in which the description was created in accordance with the latest version of ISO 3166 Codes for the representation of names of countries. Where the creator of the description is an international organisation, give the organisational identifier in place of the country code." (ISDF 5.4.1)

"Record the full authorised form of name(s) of agency(ies) responsible for creating, modifying or disseminating the description or, alternatively, record a recognized code for the agency." (ISDF 5.4.2)

"Purpose: To identify the national or international conventions or rules applied in creating the archival description. Rule: Record the names and where useful the editions or publication dates of the conventions or rules applied." (ISDF 5.4.3)
trans-unit.target: "Propósito: Identificar as convencións ou regras nacionais ou internacionais empregadas na creación da descrición arquivística. Regra: Rexistre os nomes e, onde sexa necesario, as datas de edicións o publicación das convencións o regras empregadas." (ISDF 5.4.3)

trans-unit.source: The purpose of this field is "[t]o indicate the drafting status of the description so that users can understand the current status of the description." (ISDF 5.4.4). Select Final, Revised or Draft from the drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: O propósito deste campo é "Indicar o estado de borrador da descrición de tal maneira que os usuarios coñezan o estado actual da descrición." (ISDF 5.4.4). Sleccione Final, Revisado o Borrador dende o menú despregable.

trans-unit.source: Select Full, Partial or Minimal from the drop-down menu. "In the absence of national guidelines or rules, minimum records are those that consist only of the three essential elements of an ISDF compliant record (see 4.7), while full records are those that convey information for all relevant ISDF elements of description." (ISDF 5.4.5)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione Completo, Parcial o Mínimo dende o menú despregable. "En ausencia de liñamentos ou regras nacionais, os rexistros mínimos son aquellos que consisten solo de tres elementos esenciales de un rexistro compatible con ISDF (ver 4.7), mientras que rexistros completos son aquellos que llevan infomación para todos os elementos ISDF relevantes dunha descrición."(ISDF 5.4.5)

trans-unit.source: "Record the date the description was created and the dates of any revisions to the description." (ISDF 5.4.6)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar a data en que a descrición se creou e as datas de calquera versión da descrición." (ISDF 5.4.6)

trans-unit.source: Select the language(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione o idioma(s) deste rexistro dende o menú despregable; ingrese as primeiras letras para reducir as opcións. (ISDF 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: Select the script(s) of this record from the drop-down menu; enter the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 5.4.7)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione a escritura(s) deste rexistro dende o menú despregable; ingrese as primeiras letras para reducir as opcións. (ISDF 5.4.7)

trans-unit.source: "Record the sources consulted in establishing the function description." (ISDF 5.4.8)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar as fontes consultadas no establecemento da descrición da función." (ISDF 5.4.8)

trans-unit.source: "Record notes pertinent to the creation and maintenance of the description." (ISDF 5.4.9)
trans-unit.target: "Rexistrar notas pertinentes á creación e mantención da descrición." (ISDF 5.4.9)

trans-unit.source: Select the name from the drop-down menu; enter the identifier or the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 6.1)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione o nome dende o menú despregable; ingrese o identificador o as primeiras letras para reducir as opcións. (ISDF 6.1)

trans-unit.source: Select the title from the drop-down menu; enter the identifier or the first few letters to narrow the choices. (ISDF 6.1)
trans-unit.target: Seleccione o título dende o menú despregable; ingrese o identificador ou as primeiras letras para reducir as opcións. (ISDF 6.1)
